ComicInfo.Summary:
"THE GATHERING STORM," Part One
Since his awakening in the pages of SPAWN #185, Jim Downing has been at constant odds with his new life as a Hellspawn. Now, following his confrontation with Clown, Jim is ready to step from the shadows and claim his place as a new messiah for the Digital Age.
The future starts NOW!!!
